items.content_html: reqvis is a lightweight, browser-based tool that visualizes Apache server logs through interactive canvas renderings.

items.content_html: A lightweight Express.js middleware to help you implement Trunk Based Development using feature flags.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight tool focused solely on analyzing and visualizing website performance, embeddable anywhere: including your GitHub profile README! Supports personal websites, organizations, and even repositories.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript bookmarklet that enables users to select and send webpage content to various AI platforms (e.g., ChatGPT, Gemini, Copilot) for summarization or analysis. It provides a sleek popup UI, allows format selection (Condensed vs. Bullet Summary), auto-copies the prompt, and redirects to the selected AI.
items.title: SevWren/QuickSynth: A lightweight JavaScript bookmarklet that enables users to select and send webpage content to various AI platforms (e.g., ChatGPT, Gemini, Copilot) for summarization or analysis. It provides a sleek popup UI, allows format selection (Condensed vs. Bullet Summary), auto-copies the prompt, and redirects to the selected AI.

items.content_html: # cf-worker-telegramA lightweight Cloudflare Worker that serves as a proxy for the Telegram Bot API. 🌐 This tool helps you navigate network restrictions and streamline your Telegram bot applications. 🛠️## Features- Supports all Telegram Bot API methods- Full CORS support for web applications- High performance with Cloudflare's global networ

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
items.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

items.content_html: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
items.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
